column7: Special attention is paid to the Grimms' tales in terms of traditional narrative genres, elements of life in early modern Europe, and versions from Italy and France as well as Germany. Course is conducted in English. Same as CWL 254 and ENGL 266. Credit is not given for both GER 251 and GER 250.
column9: Same as CWL 254 and ENGL 266. Credit is not given for both GER 251 and GER 250.
column10: Humanities - Lit & Arts, and Cultural Studies - Western course.
